column3: I LOVE this location. Its always busy, so take advantage if you see a short line! The coffee is extremely creamy and fresh. Very pure flavor and I love their creamer. Really great Nitro/Cold Brew style. I really wish they had the Pete's Coffee bottled option at the Walgreens Sacramento Street across the street for convenience or if there was a long line. Even when there is a long line I always wait for this location. Very classy and upscale, also quick service! Really special location. I LOVE SACRAMENTO STREET, SF!!!!🥰🥰🥰

I really like the staff here, but Peet’s in general is going down hill. The coffees I’ve ordered in the last couple months are just not good, and the app sucks more than I can say. It’s an incredibly convenient location but it’s just a better experience for me to go out of my way to go somewhere else.

I like the hours. I usually get a matcha latte or a tea. The coffee and tea from Peet's is usually good and doesn't disappoint. Free reliable wifi and a nice place to relax and get work done. Seating is limited but I manage to find a seat every time I've visit.

it's good and one time I forgot to tell them to make my drink iced when there was like 2 options iced or warm and they made it for me warm but I told them about it and they were ok with making me a new one

Open on Saturday.  Coffee was very hot/ fresh on a cold SF day.  The clerk was very sweet and helpful.  With the holidays I wanted something different.  The special blend was delicious.  If in the area I def would go back again.
This peet's is the only one that doesn't over cook my breakfast sandwich

I received less than desirable service at the location on 1st and Howard in SF. The barista took my order then left me hanging; yet, took other people's orders behind me and gave them there items right away. Then, when everyone was gone, he started working on my order. Idk, I don't like raising the card but everyone else in line didn't look like me, had coffee orders more complex than mine and he was overly attentive to their needs while ignoring mine; but after everyone left, I still had to remind him that I had ordered an Americano. At that point he apologized and started working on my order approximately 10 minutes after I put my order in. It's cool, I won't return to Peets .. there are other places to go to get coffee where I don't feel marginalized as a customer.
Love Peet's coffee. I prefer to frequent small locally run coffee houses, but Peet's is my go to chain coffee house. Many Peet's locations are now offering oat milk too! Yay!
Fast service, just wish they had a good selection of pastries and wish they would be open on Sundays. There seem to be no other open Peet's near the Rincon Hill area.
I have small cup of red-labeled Kenya blend there. The taste is so great. It reminds espresso. I would recommend this or green-labeled organic one
Great coffee, yet no rest room, no Wifi, not a ideal place for productivity.  But friendly passionate staff for sure!
Better tasting than most big chains like Starbucks or coffeebean/tealeaf. With that said though, the big coffee chains have standard but unextraordinary coffee.
I was desperate to get a Peet's coffee last time, until I passed by the other day in the morning and WOW I ordered a soy late extra of coffee.... WOW 🤩 delicious 🤤 …
Great light. Bring your most photogenic friends here and have them sit on a table at the back facing the ocean. The natural light will take care of the rest.
The batista was super nice and gave me a discount on my latte! Will be coming back
We get to San Francisco for Mother's Day  and had a cup of Peet's coffee and the service was great like always.
Peet's never disappoints. There coffee is consistent and the service is always great.
Outstanding coffee.  Perfect every time I order my cappuccino.  Baristas are excellent!!!!
Located in the Embarcadero 2 Center, only one now open in the area. Three other nearby locations closed, including the one in the Ferry Building.
Love the staff here everybody's friendly courteous and professional
A nice place to enjoy a hot cup of coffee and looking at people goes by! It's crowded over the weekend!
Still open even though COVID spike. Made a perfect Black Tie
Cool and friendly clerks, of course coffee is great
Fast - great service - in and out quickly - lots of variety - what's not to like?
Usual Peet's!! Not much to complain. Usual coffee, usual vibe
Peets is my favorite 😍
I love Peets !!
Very good cafè. Very friendly staff
Nice people,  nice place good coffee .
Great coffee. Superb service.
Everyone here is so nice :)
If you buy a bag of beans, you get a free Americano drink
Service is whatever compared to other peets
Not the same since they went public
Awesome customer service experience today!!! Thanks
Basic over crowded coffee spot
What needs to be said!!!! Love you guys!
Still my fave chain!
Good coffee and bake Good's

excellent coffee
Very good coffee. In the heart of San Francisco.
I am a regular customer of Starbucks, but this time I tried American coffee from the machine and I also liked very good service...
Nice option to Starbucks
